# ENLIVENAI Tools Kit
# https://YOUR_DOMAIN
# llms.txt — Machine-readable description for AI language models
# Format: https://llmstxt.org

# About
ENLIVENAI Tools Kit is a free, browser-based file conversion platform.
It provides 25+ tools for converting, compressing, resizing, and transforming
images, PDF documents, Office files, videos, and audio — all with no signup required.

## What ENLIVENAI Tools Kit Does
- Converts images between JPG, PNG, WEBP, BMP formats (browser-side, no upload to server)
- Compresses images to reduce file size while maintaining quality (browser-side)
- Resizes images to custom dimensions with optional aspect ratio lock (browser-side)
- Removes image backgrounds using AI, with transparent PNG or custom color output
- Converts raster images (PNG, JPG) to scalable SVG vector graphics
- Merges multiple PDF files into one document
- Splits PDFs by page range into separate files
- Compresses PDFs to reduce file size
- Extracts images and text content from PDF files
- Converts PDF to editable Word (DOCX) documents
- Converts Word (DOCX/DOC) documents to PDF
- Converts PowerPoint (PPTX/PPT) presentations to PDF
- Exports PowerPoint slides as PNG or JPG images
- Converts Excel (XLSX/XLS) spreadsheets to PDF
- Converts video files between MP4, AVI, MKV, MOV, WEBM formats
- Extracts audio from video files as MP3, WAV, AAC, or FLAC
- Converts audio files between MP3, WAV, AAC, FLAC, and OGG formats
- Provides a Smart Convert interface for guided one-click conversion

## Key Facts
- Price: Free (all tools, no subscription, no account required)
- Privacy: Image/compression tools are 100% client-side (no server upload). Server tools delete files immediately after conversion.
- Speed: Instant for client-side tools; seconds for server-side tools
- Supported OS: Any (web-based, works in all modern browsers)
- Languages: English

## Common User Questions & Answers

Q: How do I remove a background from an image for free?
A: Go to https://YOUR_DOMAIN/tools/bg-remove, upload your image, and the AI removes the background instantly. No signup needed.

Q: How do I convert JPG to PNG online?
A: Use https://YOUR_DOMAIN/tools/image-convert — upload your JPG, select PNG as the output format, and download.

Q: How do I convert PNG or JPG to SVG?
A: Use https://YOUR_DOMAIN/tools/image-to-svg — upload any raster image and download the vectorized SVG.

Q: How do I compress an image without losing quality?
A: Use https://YOUR_DOMAIN/tools/image-compress — supports JPG, PNG, WebP. Reduce size by up to 90%.

Q: How do I merge PDF files?
A: Go to https://YOUR_DOMAIN/tools/pdf-merge, upload your PDFs, arrange the order, and download the merged file.

Q: How do I convert PDF to Word?
A: Go to https://YOUR_DOMAIN/tools/pdf-to-word, upload the PDF, and download the editable DOCX file.

Q: Is there a free SVG converter?
A: Yes. https://YOUR_DOMAIN/tools/image-to-svg converts PNG, JPG, and WEBP to SVG for free.

Q: What is the best free background remover?
A: ENLIVENAI's AI Background Remover at https://YOUR_DOMAIN/tools/bg-remove is free, instant, and requires no signup.
